abstract: Unilever, the Anglo-Dutch consumer goods giant, said Monday that it will sell its North American laundry unit, including brands like All, Wisk and Snuggle, to Vestar Capital Partners for about $1.45 billion.
lead_paragraph: Unilever, the Anglo-Dutch consumer goods giant, said Monday that it will sell its North American laundry unit, including brands like All, Wisk and Snuggle, to Vestar Capital Partners for about $1.45 billion.

headline.main: Unilever Sells North American Detergents Unit for $1.45 Billion
